txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Leathery fur from the beasts north and east of Esteldín. Deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
'I will make certain that we put this to good use, thank you.'
'Leathery fur can be used in many ways. If you can find any of this fur, please bring it to us here.'
Rangers of Esteldín Task: Leathery Fur
Ferrif, a Ranger, has asked for a collection of leathery fur to be delivered to him at the Ranger's home at Esteldín.
Deliver the leathery fur to Ferrif in Esteldín
You have accepted a task to collect leathery fur from the beasts in the area surrounding Esteldín to the north and east. Once collected, you are to deliver the items to Ferrif within Esteldín.
Wanted: Leathery fur from the beasts north and east of Esteldín.
